Package de.altwagen.Car

Class CarManager

java.lang.Object
de.altwagen.Car.CarManager
public class CarManager
extends java.lang.Object
This singleton-class manages all cars. Cars should only be created and deleted through this class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Car addNewCar​(java.lang.String chassisNumber, java.lang.String constructionYear, int drivenKM, java.lang.String brand, java.lang.String model, java.lang.String note, CarStatus status)
    add a new car to the list
    boolean addOrChangeCar​(Car car)
    add the car to the list if it does not exist or change the car if there exists a car with identical chassisNumber
    static void clearInstance()  
    void deleteCar​(java.lang.String chassisNumber)
    delete car with given chassisNumber
    Car getCarByChassisNumber​(java.lang.String chassisNumber)
    search in the List for a car with the given chassisNumber
    static CarManager getInstance()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Car> listCarsByLocation​(Location location)
    search in the car array for all cars which are at the given Location
    java.util.ArrayList<Car> listCarsByStatus​(CarStatus status)
    search in the car array for all cars with the given CarStatus

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • listCarsByStatus

      public java.util.ArrayList<Car> listCarsByStatus​(CarStatus status)
      search in the car array for all cars with the given CarStatus
      Parameters:
      status -
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all Cars found, if no car is found an empty ArrayList is returned

    • listCarsByLocation

      search in the car array for all cars which are at the given Location
      Parameters:
      location -
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all Cars at that Location, if there is no car an empty ArrayList is returned
